name: Serene Grace
summary: If a move has a secondary effect, the chances of the secondary effect executing is doubled.
viability: Serene Grace is one of the most irritating abilities around, particularly bceause of Jirachi, Shaymin-Sky, and Togekiss using Thunder Wave in conjunction with either Iron Head, for the former, or Air Slash, for the latter two. Iron Head and Air Slash both have a 60% chance of flinching the opponent, increased from the usual 30%. That makes those three very difficult to counter under this strategy. While Shaymin-Sky can't use Thunder Wave, it gets access to Seed Flare, which goes from a 40% chance of dropping the opponent's Special Defense by 2 stakes to an 80% chance. This guarantees Shaymin-Sky at least a few kills.
